title: dumb glitch
body: alright so i'm playing a ranked game we get to the end and we win, the victory screen comes up so i click victory to go to stats but stats wont load so i just click skip stats then i proceed to not get any lp for my win so i reset my client normally fixes this now its saying ive disconnected from a already done game and it wont let me go anywhere i already tried to connect but it just stays black ive reseted my client 5 times and repaired it and nothing its getting extremly annoying plus i cant send in a ticket cause riot supp keeps logging me out when i log in help anyone please?

replies.body:
Hmm...haven't seen reports of the support site recently.  If you're getting any sort of error message, screenshots would help a lot. Also confirming whether or not it successfully logs you in, then forces a log out, or if you "log in" but then it just redirects to the same page without you being logged in.  

For the game issue, it sounds like a ghost game.  This can happen sometimes when the game server fails to communicate the end-of-game message (basically saying "Hey! I'm done now!") to the PvP.net client.  Maximum time this can last is ~2 hours, though it often ends much much earlier.

Sorry for the wait, but if you see this frequently, lemme know since it could mean a different problem with your connection.

this bug is all over reddit and the "report a bug" glitch. What can we do about the loss of LP for my win during the ghost game? I'm sure it wasn't just this guy's connection because it's been happening since about two days ago.

If you're repeatedly getting ghost games (or what sound like ghost games), go ahead and [send us a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  They can happen occasionally, but shouldn't be a daily thing.

Also shouldn't lose LP for ghost games. Can happen rarely, but usually only when there's broader issues happening at the same time. Most of the time the LP gains/losses are just delayed, but should show up after a bit.

I've sent a ticket and the Rioter said my match history is definitely missing a game. It's been two days and I still haven't gotten the LP back (the Rioter claims maybe something about a 10 person disconnect? but all our internets were fine?) If it's been two days, do I still have hope of getting my LP back?
if it comes up with the error for not able to connect to PvP .net client instead of waiting the 2 hours you can right click the icon and hit run as admin and it instantly repairs it or should

alright well it has finally unlocked its self and i can now log in and do everything normal the only issue is that match hasen't shown up and i never gained lp for the win but hey problem fixed ill take my losses <3

In theory, you should still gain LP, just delayed.  Since the end-of-game message was delayed (causing the ghost game), the stats that go along with it are also delayed.   In some rare cases, the game stats could be lost, but I'm not seeing anything unusual at the moment. If the win as Mundo was your last ranked game, then it looks like it counted correctly.
Well it was a malphite game after the Mundo one that was lost not the Mundo game.
